/** loadToolToViewport
  *
  */
[RoutineDef, loadToolToViewport
,
	[VarSet, currentstroke, [IGetTitle, STROKE:ItemInfo]]

	//[Note, currentstroke ]

	[IGet, ALPHA:ItemInfo]

	[IKeyPress, 78,[IPress, Document:New Document]]

	[FileNameSetNext, toolpath ]
	[IPress,Tool:Load Tool]

	[IPress, Stroke:DragRect]
	[CanvasStroke,(ZObjStrokeV02n10=H126V47DYH126V47DK1Xh1267Fv47C80H126V47EH126V47FH126V480H126V481H126V482H126V483H126V483)]

	[IPress, Transform:Edit]

	[IPress, Draw:Perspective]

	[If, [Var, currentstroke]
	, // THEN
		[IPress, [StrMerge, "Stroke:", currentstroke] ]
	]

	/* ROTATE CAMERA TO 45Â° View */
	//[CanvasStroke,(ZObjStrokeV03n109%p4F0A838p3EEEB9CPn-AE2Dn5661n-)
	// ,1 /* 1=Freeze UI then stroke ends */]

	[IPress, Transform:Fit]
	[IPress, Transform:Fit]

	[RoutineCall, saveToolPath, 0, toolpath ] // Save as last used tool

, // PARAMS
	toolpath
]
